# Exclude patterns for muffet link checker
# Patterns that should be ignored when checking links

# External domains that we don't want to check
# (muffet will only check internal links by default when given a single starting URL)

# Common problematic URL patterns
.*facebook\.com.*
.*twitter\.com.*
.*linkedin\.com.*
.*instagram\.com.*

# Dynamic URLs that might be unstable
.*\?.*utm_.*
.*\#.*share.*
